oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Singing Americans Publicity Photo
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Singing Americans (Musical group);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white half-length studio portrait of the Singing Americans. The photo was released by Victory Music Corporation and Century II Promotions. A handwritten note says, "65.4." On the back of the photo, a typed note says, "Singing Americans 5/82," and a handwritten note says, "85 line wb 24 high 36 wide," presumably in reference to the size of the metal photoplate made from the photo. To view a poster that features the metal photoplate, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/30761.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:accessRights: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
